14.content: Bill walked to the door and opened it. The man was dressed in his black business suit as he was about to head to work. He then stopped walking and looked down, noticing a strange package. He picked it up and went back inside, setting it on the coffee table in the living room. The man then opened up the box to find two silver necklaces. One had a blue stone in it while the other had a red stone. Along with the necklaces, he found a note. "Wear these necklaces and see what another's life is like," The note said. Bill examined the necklaces, curious to see if they actually worked. Then..
